name: CAMetalLayer
desc: A Core Animation layer that Metal can render into, typically to be displayed onscreen.

items.name: device
items.desc: The Metal device responsible for the layer’s drawable resources.

items.name: preferredDevice
items.desc: The device object that the system recommends using for this layer.

items.name: pixelFormat
items.desc: The pixel format of the layer’s textures.

items.name: colorspace
items.desc: The color space of the rendered content.

items.name: framebufferOnly
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the layer’s textures are used only for rendering.

items.name: drawableSize
items.desc: The size, in pixels, of textures for rendering layer content.

items.name: presentsWithTransaction
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the layer presents its content using a Core Animation transaction.

items.name: displaySyncEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the layer synchronizes its updates to the display’s refresh rate.

items.name: wantsExtendedDynamicRangeContent
items.desc: Enables extended dynamic range values onscreen.

items.name: edrMetadata
items.desc: Metadata describing the tone mapping to apply to the extended dynamic range (EDR) values in the layer.

items.name: nextDrawable
items.desc: Waits until a Metal drawable is available, and then returns it.

items.name: maximumDrawableCount
items.desc: The number of Metal drawables in the resource pool managed by Core Animation.

items.name: allowsNextDrawableTimeout
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether requests for a new buffer expire if the system can’t satisfy them.
